figcaption.p: Happy Easter from Mrs. Guererri & Mrs. Dehn

div.div: We will challenge all learners and work in partnership with students, parents, and community to achieve high standards.

Welcome to the electronic home of the Manchester-Shortsville School District, also known as Red Jacket Schools! The Manchester and Shortsville communities value public education and are committed to providing the best resources available to prepare our students for their future. With highly qualified staff and a supportive community, we are committed to excellence in academics, arts and athletics. Our mission is that we will challenge all learners and work in partnership with students, parents, and the community to achieve high standards. Thank you for visiting us on the web and we hope you'll make the Manchester-Shortsville community your home.

article.aria-label: RED JACKET ANNOUNCES INAUGURAL CLASS OF “GRADUATES OF DISTINCTION”

h3.a: RED JACKET ANNOUNCES INAUGURAL CLASS OF “GRADUATES OF DISTINCTION”

div.div: Manchester-Shortsville Central School District is proud to announce its inaugural class of Red Jacket High School Graduates of Distinction. The Graduates of Distinction Program recognizes alumni of Red Jacket High School who have achieved distinction through outstanding accomplishments or lifetime achievements.
